description.english: Get Ed to shake Julia's hand.
description.german: Lass Ed Julias Hand schütteln.
description.french: Forcer Ed à serrer la main de Julia.
description.italian: Fai in modo che Ed stringa la mano a Julia.
description.spanish: Fuerza que Ed estreche la mano de Julia.

description.english: Fill Petronius' bowl.
description.german: Fülle Petronius' Napf.
description.french: Remplir le bol de Petronius.
description.italian: Riempi la ciotola di Petronius.
description.spanish: Llena el bol de Petronius.

description.english: Do not let Faye get cold.
description.german: Lass es Faye nicht kalt werden.
description.french: Ne pas laisser Faye attraper froid.
description.italian: Non fare prendere freddo a Faye.
description.spanish: Evita que Faye coja frío.

description.english: Listen to Faye's song all the way through.
description.german: Hör dir Fayes Lied komplett an.
description.french: Écouter la chanson de Faye jusqu'au bout.
description.italian: Ascolta la canzone di Faye fino alla fine.
description.spanish: Escucha la canción de Faye hasta el final.
description.russian: Прослушать песню Фэй до самого конца

description.english: Complete Ed's first therapy session.
description.german: Schließe Eds 1. Therapie-Sitzung ab.
description.french: Terminer la première session de thérapie d'Ed.
description.italian: Completa la prima sessione di terapia di Ed.
description.spanish: Completa la primera sesión de terapia de Ed.

description.english: Access one of Julia's childhood memories.
description.german: Greife auf eine von Julias Kindheitserinnerungen zurück.
description.french: Accéder à l'un des souvenirs d'enfance de Julia.
description.italian: Accedi a un ricordo infantile di Julia.
description.spanish: Accede a un recuerdo infantil de Julia.
description.russian: Получить доступ к одному из детских воспоминаний Джулии.

description.english: Feed Frankie Laine just like he deserves.
description.german: Füttere Frankie Laine wie er es sich verdient hat.
description.french: Nourrir Frankie Laine comme il le mérite.
description.italian: Nutri Frankie Laine come merita.
description.spanish: Alimenta a Frankie Laine como se merece.
description.russian: Накормить Фрэнки Лэйна, как он того заслуживает.

description.english: Find Samuel Franklin.
description.german: Finde Samuel Franklin.
description.french: Trouver Samuel Franklin.
description.italian: Trova Samuel Franklin.
description.spanish: Encuentra a Samuel Franklin.

description.english: Help Eddie Miller become the season's hero.
description.german: Hilf Eddie Miller, der Held der Saison zu werden.
description.french: Aider Eddie Miller à devenir le héros de la saison.
description.italian: Aiuta Eddie Miller a diventare l'eroe della stagione.
description.spanish: Convierte a Eddie Miller en el héroe de la temporada.
description.russian: Помочь Эдди Миллеру стать героем баскетбольного сезона.

description.english: Find all of Captain Roberts' spies.
description.german: Finde alle Spione von Käpt'n Roberts.
description.french: Trouver tous les espions du Capitaine Roberts.
description.italian: Trova tutte le spie del capitano Roberts.
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los espías del capitán Roberts.

description.english: Complete the Pirate Brotherhood's secret handshake.
description.german: Perfektioniere den geheimen Handschlag der Piraten-Bruderschaft.
description.french: Réussir la poignée de main secrète de la Confrérie des Pirates.
description.italian: Completa il saluto segreto della Confraternita Pirata.
description.spanish: Completa el Saludo Secreto de la Hermandad Pirata.

description.english: Get mom's congratulations for storing the groceries quickly.
description.german: Hol dir Moms Lob für das schnelle Einräumen der Einkäufe.
description.french: Obtenir des félicitations de maman pour avoir rapidement rangé les courses.
description.italian: Ricevi i complimenti di mamma per aver sistemato la spesa in fretta.
description.spanish: Recibe la felicitación de mamá por colocar la compra rápido.
description.russian: Получить от мамы комплимент за быстро разобранные покупки.

description.english: Complete Ed's second therapy session.
description.german: Schließe Eds 2. Therapie-Sitzung ab.
description.french: Terminer la seconde session de thérapie d'Ed.
description.italian: Completa la seconda sessione di terapia di Ed.
description.spanish: Completa la segunda sesión de terapia de Ed.

description.english: Comfort Robert.
description.german: Tröste Robert.
description.french: Réconforter Robert.
description.italian: Offri conforto a Robert.
description.spanish: Ofrece consuelo a Robert.

description.english: Find evidence against Ed Miller.
description.german: Finde Beweise gegen Ed Miller.
description.french: Trouver une preuve incriminant Ed Miller.
description.italian: Trova prove contro Ed Miller.
description.spanish: Encuentra pruebas contra Ed Miller.

description.english: Complete Ed's third therapy session.
description.german: Schließe Eds 3. Therapie-Sitzung ab.
description.french: Terminer la troisième session de thérapie d'Ed.
description.italian: Completa la terza sessione di terapia di Ed.
description.spanish: Completa la tercera sesión de terapia de Ed.

description.english: Complete Ed's fourth therapy session.
description.german: Schließe Eds 4. Therapie-Sitzung ab.
description.french: Terminer la quatrième session de thérapie d'Ed.
description.italian: Completa la quarta sessione di terapia di Ed.
description.spanish: Completa la cuarta sesión de terapia de Ed.

description.english: Dive into Julia and Nick's past.
description.german: Tauche ein in die Vergangenheit von Julia und Nick.
description.french: Plonger dans le passé de Julia et de Nick.
description.italian: Esplora il passato di Julia e Nick.
description.spanish: Bucea en el pasado de Julia y Nick.
description.russian: Окунуться в прошлое Джулии и Ника.

description.english: Complete Ed's fifth therapy session.
description.german: Schließe Eds 5. Therapie-Sitzung ab.
description.french: Terminer la cinquième session de thérapie d'Ed.
description.italian: Completa la quinta sessione di terapia di Ed.
description.spanish: Completa la quinta sesión de terapia de Ed.

description.english: Fix a car.
description.german: Repariere ein Auto.
description.french: Réparer la voiture.
description.italian: Ripara un'auto.
description.spanish: Repara un coche.

description.english: Confirm the existence of Ed's daughter.
description.german: Bestätige die Existenz von Eds Tochter.
description.french: Confirmer l'existence de la fille d'Ed.
description.italian: Conferma l'esistenza della figlia di Ed.
description.spanish: Confirma la existencia de la hija de Ed.

description.english: Dine at Mamma Louise.
description.german: Iss bei Mama Louise.
description.french: Dîner chez Mama Louise.
description.italian: Cena da Mama Louise.
description.spanish: Cena en Mamma Louise.

description.english: Throw Ed's car down the cliff.
description.german: Lass Eds Wagen von der Klippe stürzen.
description.french: Balancer la voiture d'Ed du haut de la falaise.
description.italian: Getta l'auto di Ed giù nel precipizio.
description.spanish: Lanza el coche de Ed precipicio abajo.

description.english: Kill Lisa Horowitz.
description.german: Tötet Lisa Horowitz.
description.french: Tuer Lisa Horowitz.
description.italian: Uccidi Lisa Horowitz.
description.spanish: Mata a Lisa Horowitz.

description.english: Say goodbye to a childhood friend.
description.german: Verabschiede dich von einem Freund aus Kindertagen.
description.french: Dire au revoir à un ami d'enfance.
description.italian: Di' addio a un'amica d'infanzia.
description.spanish: Despídete de una amiga de la infancia.

description.english: Make sure Ed doesn't get thirsty.
description.german: Achte darauf, dass Ed keinen Durst leidet.
description.french: S'assurer qu'Ed n'ait pas soif.
description.italian: Assicurati che Ed non abbia sete.
description.spanish: Asegúrate de que Ed no pase sed.
description.russian: Не допустить, чтобы Эда мучила жажда.

description.english: Get rid of your father's influence.
description.german: Befreie dich vom Einfluss deines Vaters.
description.french: Se débarrasser de l'influence paternelle.
description.italian: Liberati dell'influenza di tuo padre.
description.spanish: Líbrate de la influencia paterna.

description.english: Take a seat.
description.german: Setz dich.
description.french: S'asseoir.
description.italian: Siediti.
description.spanish: Toma asiento.

description.english: Convince Adam to release you.
description.german: Bring Adam dazu, dich gehen zu lassen.
description.french: Convaincre Adam de vous libérer.
description.italian: Convinci Adam a liberarti.
description.spanish: Convence a Adam de que te libere.

description.english: Overcome Vertigo by saving Esther Franklin and Jenny.
description.german: Überwinde deine Höhenangst und rette Esther Franklin und Jenny.
description.french: Surmonter le vertige en sauvant Esther Franklin et Jenny.
description.italian: Supera le vertigini salvando Esther Franklin e Jenny.
description.spanish: Supera el vértigo salvando a Esther Franklin y a Jenny.
description.russian: Справиться с вертиго, спасая Эстер Франклин и Дженни.

description.english: Get Julia and Nick together.
description.german: Bring Julia und Nick zusammen.
description.french: S'arranger pour que Julia et Nick finissent ensemble.
description.italian: Fai sì che Julia e Nick stiano insieme.
description.spanish: Haz que Julia y Nick acaben juntos.
